txt.en: 'You have been given some leave to help me ease my troubles, have you? I have just the thing for you.\n\n'I cannot leave my post as the gate-watcher, but I long to be cleaning the fields of the fanged menace that roams ever nearer to our doors. Those evil hounds grow bold -- they do not fear us as they should. It would be a good task for you, [placeholder].'
'Wonderfully done, my friend! That was a kind deed you did for us. I hope they do not interfere with you as they do with the rest of us....'
'You can find the vicious hounds in the Foetid Caves, I believe.'
A Growling Menace at the Gate
Vicious hounds roam the fields of Eorlsmead and have gathered in a dangerous den not far from the city.
Defeat vile hounds at the Foetid Caves ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Evil, slavering hounds can be found in the Foetid Caves in Eorlmead, south-east of Stangard along the river Limlight.\n\nYou should slay many of the evil hounds.
Sabert can be found in Stangard, guarding the main gate.\n\nYou should speak with Sabert about the help you lent the city.
